name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Internet School of Go playback speed

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to control playback speed of Guo Juan's Internet School of Go

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Guo Juan's Internet School of Go has more than a thousand of excellent lectures. However, playback speed is limited to normal speed and 1.5x. For many students normal speed is too slow, and 1.5x is too fast. This extension lets the students control the speed with finer granularity.

Go to the lecture, click on the extension icon, and drag the slider to set the speed. The extension will keep this speed every time you listen to Guo's lectures.
